title: We’re looking for a roommate!! Beautiful Temescal Victorian
description:
Seeking a housemate in our gorgeous 3 bedroom Temescal home.

Lovely housemates with a relaxed vibe, looking for someone for a year - and ideally by August 1! We do have a very sweet and shy cat, but no other pets please.

title: Looking for a new roommate: Room in 2bd/1ba Spacious Hills apart
description:
My roommate is moving cities and is moving out, so her room is available in a 2bed/1bath apartment in Berkeley Hills beginning August 1 - somewhat flexible move-in date. I had two roommates so far, male and female. Got along with both, so no gender preferences!

Pic link: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1c5Jp3xyG-KO7g1i45XcaCZC6yj0G7Efk?usp=drive_link

• 170 sqft room with large closet
• peaceful backyard
• living room w/ floor-to-ceiling windows
• great views within 2 mins walk
• gas stove/dishwasher
• in-unit washer/dryer and central heating
• Plentiful storage
• driveway parking spot & easy street parking

The nearest cross streets are Fairlawn Drive/Arcade Avenue.
AC Transit 65 line stops right down the street, alternative is a 10 min walk to Lawrence Hall of Science (can catch a free Berkeley Shuttle Hill line down to campus), or ~30 min walk to Cory.

I am a 6th-year Econ PhD student, and I have a Maine Coon cat named Kunus (see pics).

title: Looking for a Roommate
description:
About the room
- The house has 6 bedrooms with 4.5 bathrooms.
- bright, quiet, carpeted
- Equipped with wardrobe, curtains, Desk, Full size bed, 3-Drawer Dresser,
- Private bathroom outside this room
( Can be provided furnished or unfurnished . )


About Rent:
- Rental $890 per month (one person only) , Utilities not included
- Utilities shared among tenants: Gas, electricity, water, garbage, cleaning fee, internet, etc...around $90/month summer, around $120/month winter)Depends on number of people and season.
- Deposit is $890 subject to credit approval for tenants who meet the following criteria.


MISC:
- Proof of credit score 650 and up, credit and back ground check.
- Proof of stable income 3x the monthly rent.
- Co-signer Okay
- Students work or steady income.
- 6 months lease, then month to month.
- Access to kitchen, laundry, living room, backyard.
- Clean, light cooking.
- NO drugs, no drinking/smoking, no pets, no overnight guests.
- NO eviction, good previous landlord references.

Please tell me:
- A bit about yourself, work/school schedule, contact info 
- When you're looking to move in?


you must view the property before considering applying. We will not process applicants who have not visited the property.

Thank you.




.

title: Looking for A Roommate to Share 2BR 1BA Beautiful Apartment
description:
This apartment already has one occupant (SF State student). This occupant is looking for one roommate to share this 2br/1ba apartment. No more than a total of two occupants for the entire apartment.
Monthly rent $1300/month+ utility (PG&E and water) for ONE occupant. 

Located on a quiet, pleasant and scenic block in Golden Gate Heights
This garden level unit is located within a fully detached home

Pleasant 2 bedroom 1 full bath with plenty of natural lights
Private entrance
Large and bright living/dining room with kitchen
Granite countertops
Good sized bedrooms with big closets and double paned windows
Hardwood floors
Large storage area within apartment
Mini garden area by entrance to grow your favorite herbs and plants
Full access to large backyard
Laundry is not available but laundry facility is only within a 5 minute drive
Extremely easy street parking
Central to all amenities: restaurants, shops, Stonestown mall, Lakeshore Plaza, Safeway, Trader Joe, public libraries..
Walking distance to Grandview Park (spectacular views!!!) and beautiful Moraga Steps. Golden Gate Park is just minutes of driving away.
Within 10 minute drive to UCSF, SFSU and CCSF. Direct bus line to UCSF one block away and direct lines to SFSU and downtown 4 blocks away.
Convenient public transportation: L-Taraval, Muni 66, 6, 28.

Sorry, no pets, no smoking and no recreational drug
Available August 1
One-year lease required. First month rent $1300 (for 1 occupant) + security deposit $2000 to move in. Excellent credit required. References from prior landlord(s) required.

For serious inquiry only, please call Ed at  show contact info
 for appointment.
When applying for the unit, please provide at least 3 months of bank statements, credit report and two paystubs (or hiring letter).

title: Looking for single female roommate in a 2 bedroom apartment
description:
Private Room in Peaceful 2BR Apt – $1,575 – Female Preferred – Walnut Creek (Balcony, Pool View, Near Freeways & Kaiser)

Hi! I’m looking for a female roommate (single occupancy only) to share my peaceful, fully furnished 2-bedroom apartment in the Saranap area of Walnut Creek — just minutes from downtown, hiking trails, and only 5 minutes from Kaiser Permanente. Plus, only 30 seconds from Highway 24, and close to Highway 680. Ideal for commuters, travel professionals, or anyone needing quick access to Kaiser.

🛏️ Your unfurnished private bedroom is approx. 135 sq ft and includes a large built-in closet.
🌿 Shared areas include:
 • Fully equipped kitchen
 • Bright dining area
 • Cozy living room
 • Balcony with relaxing pool and garden views
 • On-site laundry
 • Access to pool, fire pit, and BBQ area

💻 I work from home, so I’m ideally looking for someone who works outside the home.

🐱 I have clean, quiet indoor cats. No additional pets allowed due to property restrictions.

🔹 Rent: $1,575/month – includes WiFi, water, trash, PG&E (included unless there is excessive use, in which case the tenant may be responsible for the difference), and apartment cleaning
🔹 Preferred: 6-month lease, but open to shorter stays for the right fit (e.g. travel nurses or contract workers)
🔹 Furnished room available at a higher rate – please inquire if interested
🔹 Free, easy street parking
🔹 No smoking, drugs, couples, or frequent overnight guests

I’m seeking a professional woman in her 30s or 40s who’s respectful, clean, and values a calm, cat-friendly home.

📩 If this sounds like a good match, please message me with a bit about yourself (job, schedule, lifestyle, move-in timing). Happy to offer tours!

title: Looking for a Roommate for Spacious Condo
description:
Are you seeking a cozy place to call home? Look no further! We have two furnished rooms available on the 3rd floor of our condo, both boasting great natural light with high windows facing the south. The bathroom is conveniently located right across the rooms.

About the condo:

Built in 2005 with carpet floors, high ceilings, and stunning industrial architecture to match neighboring art studios and lofts.
Shared space includes a spacious living room and a fully equipped kitchen.
Located just minutes away from Downtown Alameda, where you can find cafes, pubs, beer gardens, nice restaurants, a movie theater, health-conscious eco-friendly grocery store, and an organic produce store.
The beach is a short 7-minute bike ride away, and we're happy to lend bicycles.

About You:

Friendly, respectful, and environmentally-conscious.
Non-smoker.
Clean and tidy habits.
Gainfully employed or a responsible student.
Able to pay rent and utilities on time.
Light cooking preferred.
Must keep it quiet after 10 pm.

About Us:

We are a friendly and neat couple, mostly working from home. 
We love hosting people and sharing our place with others.
We are busy people but we often find time for a movie night or shared dinners.

Rent and Details:

Rent: 1st room - 1600/month (furnished); 2nd room- 1400/month (unfurnished)
Utilities included.
Security deposit required.
Available for month-to-month lease.
Street parking available.
No smoking, no pets.

If you're interested in sharing this wonderful condo with us, please send us an email introducing yourself. Tell us a bit about yourself, your lifestyle, and what you're looking for in a living situation. We'd love to arrange a time for you to come see the place and get to know each other better!

title: Looking For 1 Roommate - Available Until I Remove
description:
My name is Pearl, working full time nurse, quiet, professional. I am looking for one roommate to fill 1 room in a 3bd/2baths house I’m renting near Walnut Creek. 2nd room is my office and a guest room. You have access to house. The house has a living room, a kitchen, a refrigerator, a washer, a huge backyard with a deck, and a garage. Water, Garbage included. We split other utilities. It’s in a safe, quiet area neighborhood in a cul de sac, away from busy street, close to restaurants, Ross, Kohl’s, etc. You’ll have access to the entire house. The cost is $1,500 per month, with your own bathroom. I hope for a long-term lease, with a minimum of one year. No smoking inside the house.

I’m looking for a roommate who values cleanliness, communication, respect, friendly, chill, relax, clean after. If interested, feel free to message me. 1 room with own bathroom. LGBT friendly.

About the roommate: 
Live by myself, working, quiet, professional. When I’m home, I love cooking, watching TV. I’m friendly and great with having dinner together sometimes if you like. I clean after and if in rush, I will get back to it later. I respect your privacy and will not disturb and mind my own but if you like to do something eat out whatever, you can ask me, I’m open.

I have 2 egg layering chicken, not pet.

title: Brand New Luxury Apartment – Looking for Roommate (1BR + Private Bath)
description:
2 months old building in the heart of SF. A 1BR + Private Bath in Luxury SoMa Apartment – Aug 15 Move-In

Looking for someone to take over my former roommate’s half of our 2BR/2BA apartment in the heart of SoMa, starting Aug 15, 2025. You'll have your own bedroom + private bathroom, and share the spacious living room and kitchen.

Why you’ll love it:
- Breathtaking city views from two rooftop decks
-Gym, business lounge – perfect for remote work & downtime
-Prime location – 10 min walk to BART & Train + 8 min to grocery store

Safe, central, and walkable — steps from Yerba Buena Gardens

Ideal for someone looking for short-term luxury city living.

Contact for details and real pictures!
Video with views from Balcony: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fZGIV1oGOu0-7oNuVxw1Sk8EfvWmo4oy/view?usp=sharing

(Bedroom is unfurnished)

description:
Looking for Roommate 
Room for Rent – San Carlos, CA

title: Looking for roommates at a large 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms Condo Unit
description:
We are looking for roommates at a large 3 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms (one bedroom is a master bedroom with its own bathroom & is occupied already). We are looking for 2 roommates for the other 2 separate bedrooms with shared bathroom. The unit is a 2-story building. Upper floor including a master bedroom, a large living room, dining room, open kitchen & a large balcony. The lower floor has 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom, laundry room & a storage room. The rental 2 bedroom 1 bath is at the lower level. The rent for each of the 2 bedrooms is $1300/month plus $1500 deposit each. Minimum one-year lease. Prefer female roommates, no smoking, no pets. The rent including assigned parking spots, garbage fee. Tenants pay all utilities including PG&E, water, internet, cable TV, etc. Condo is close to shopping, 280 Freeway, park. Interested party please text to  show contact info
 for showing (DO NOT CALL). Thank you!

title: Looking for Roommate in a cozy 2 Bed 2 Bath Benicia Apartment
description:
Hi everyone,

I am looking for a (cat-friendly) roommate for my 2 bed 2 bath (both attached) apartment at Club Pacifica Apartments, Benicia. It is a community with over 200 apartments and good views of the bay.

Here are the details of the apartment: 

Area: 968 Sp Ft
Rent: $2785/month (split $1392.50 each)
Utilities around $90 for water, sewage and trash for each resident
PG&E and internet cost will be split
In-unit washer and dryer
Parking included with rent
Move in date: 07/15/2025 (12 months lease)
Other amenities include: Gym, Movement Studio, BBQ area, Hot Tubs, Pool, Parcel Lockers
Floor plan and video tour available at the Club Pacifica Benicia website
Must be approved by rental agency to add to lease

Here is a little bit about me. I am a 27 year old male and graduated from UCLA in 2020. I am an incoming OMS-1 at Touro University College of Osteopathic Medicine. I expect to spend most of my time studying in my room or at the library. Beyond medicine my interests include reading sci-fi/high fantasy novels, working out, trying different cuisines, gaming on my PC and chilling with my 2 cats. The most important characteristics I am seeking in a roommate are keeping communal areas neat and paying rent on time. If you are interested in knowing more please DM me!

title: Looking for a good fit for our house!
description:
Hi all, we're looking for someone who is a good fit to the house above everything else. We get along decently well, and want to keep the house a good space. Ideally looking for just one person, but we would consider a couple if it seemed like a good fit. There is also one cat in the house that mostly hangs out in her owners room, so please take note if you're allergic. 

The pictures attached are from a previous roommate, but give you an idea of what you can fit in the room itself. 

We are open-minded roomies who are open to folks of all races, genders, sexual orientations, etc. The lease starts at 6 months, and then month to month after that; but we are ideally looking for a longer term roommate.. If this sounds like it could be a good fit for you please respond to this posting with some basic info about yourself (links to social media highly encouraged/prioritized!)


About the house:

4 bed, 2 bath located near the corner of 25th and Balboa. We’re right on the 31 bus route/within walking distance to both the 5 and 38. The neighborhood is cozy/quiet (for SF) and walking distance from a few markets (a few mom and pops/Grocery Outlet/Safeway), some good restaurants on Geary/Clement, GG Park, and several Beaches (Ocean/Baker/China). If you have a car street parking is pretty manageable and we rotate sharing the one car garage.


The home has a washer/dryer onsite (no coin op) and a small backyard that's great for grilling during the Summer. The common areas are fully furnished (though if you come with furniture we can definitely discuss switching out pieces that may be a better fit for the space). We all use the garage for storage of outdoor gear, bikes, and miscellaneous things we can’t fit into our rooms.


The room we’re looking to fill is spacious (12x14) and has a great closet with lots of storage. It’s at the back of the house, so it’s fairly quiet and it shares a bathroom with another roommate on the bottom floor. It is unfurnished, but easily fits a queen bed, desk, etc. (All furniture in the bedroom pics are from a previous roommate)


Rent is split evenly with each of us paying $1075/m. Security deposit is $1462.50 and due at the time the lease is signed, so total move in cost would be $2537.50. Utilities (trash/internet/water/gas) come out to just under $90/m, but varies with water/heat use. Our awesome landlord is kind and responsive, but not overbearing in any way. She does a credit check before signing, but keeps the rent low to attract solid tenants, so we do our best to maintain the house as a massive thank you to her for being fantastic.

About us:

The roomies are two guys and one lady, and all of us are in our 20s/30s. We get along decently and help each other out with favors when needed. We generally do our own things and keep busy, but see each other in the kitchen/living room when we're free at the same time. We try and keep our common spaces tidy/clean, with a few monthly chores split between all of us. We are not overly strict about COVID precautions, although we are all vaccinated, etc. We enjoy hosting friends for dinner and drinks here and there (think low key weeknight dinners/drinks).  


D - The oldest roommate (36) has been living in SF for over 10 years, mostly in this house. He used to work in food/hospitality industry (cook/server/bartender/barista/etc) but is finishing law school and devotes almost all of his time to that these days. Born in CA, but not a Bay Area native, he’s a homebody who enjoys reading, writing, video games, and a good meal.

B - is 35 years old, working as a bartender and is a Bay Area native. When he's not working he enjoys live comedy, golf of all kinds, movies, and gaming. His folks live down in SJ, so every once in a while he makes the treck down to visit them and enjoy all the good food on the way.

C- is a 28 year old female who works as a nanny for a family nearby and has been in the house since December. She has a cat named Luna who mostly stays in her room, but is adorable and we are trying to get her comfortable enough to explore the house as she wants. Another Bay Area native, she spends her free time going out to art events and hanging out with friends or family.

title: Looking for Roommate in North Berkeley ($1.5k)
description:
My roommate and I (both black males) are looking for a roommate to continue our lease for another year at our 3-bedroom/2-bathroom apartment in North Berkeley.

Rent: 1.5k + PGE + internet
The whole apartment is furnished and the bedroom comes with a desk, bookshelf, mattress, and bed frame, one of us owns a cat, and there's a balcony, heater, and washer and dryer machines on the property. There's a parking garage that costs extra per month.

We're ideally looking for POC and/or queer individuals but anyone interested is welcome to reach out. Just text me, especially if you have any questions.

A little bit about the general area:
We're very near several buses to the UC Berkeley campus (79, 18, 12, +7). Down the street from Safeway and a bus ride away from Trader  Joe's. There's a farmer's market up the street every Thursday. Generally a tranquil neighborhood, great if you enjoy quiet.

We just want our last year at the apartment to be chill and a good energy! Text me if you're interested. <3

title: Female Looking For Roommate
description:
Hi I have a bedroom available for rent in the West SJ area. 

Preferably looking for a female roommate.

Not tolerated:
-late rent
-overnight guests
-excessive drinking
-no smoking
-no pets
-loud noises after 10pm

This is a kid friendly quiet neighborhood. Background check may be required. Full kitchen access. Mini fridge for yourself. Plenty of counter space available as well. I tend to clean as I go and am an organized person. I am looking to share my space with the right person. If you think we would be a good fit please reach out to me. Thanks!

*Note: Bedroom will be empty. Queen sized mattress used for size reference.

title: Private room for rent, searching for a roommate
description:
Seeking a female roommate in her 20s or 30s to join me in a 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment. 

Location: South San Jose

Private en suite bathroom

Apartment Complex has:

Room available now  
12 month lease

A little about me: I am a 30-year old teacher at local elementary school. I grew up in the bay area and have lived in this apartment for 1 year. I'm early to bed, early to rise, and spend most weekends out and about with family & friends. I am very clean, organized, and communicative. Looking for a friendly and compatible roommate to join me in, as my previous roommate has just moved out.

title: A Specious Bright Bedroom for Rent
description:
* Newly updated Remodel

(border of Los Gatos & Campbell)

Looking forward to hearing from you!
*** Pictures will provide upon request ***

title: Roommate needed for 3 bed 2 bath in west Oakland.
description: We're looking for a Roommate to move in to our 3 bed 2 bath spot in west Oakland. You'd be sharing the space with myself and one other roommate. Both Chefs, one at a restaurant the other works mostly from home. Rent is $1084 plus utilities(EBMUD, PG&E, Internet). Deposit is $667. The space is Available now so you could move in ASAP. Please respond with a little bit about yourself and what your availability is so we can set up a time to meet and let you see the space.

title: Look for male roommate Near UC Berkeley 1 B from 2B1B, in unit laundry
description:
Fully furnished 2 Bed,1 Bath apartment with 6 blocks, a 15 mins easy walk to UC Berkeley Campus and 4-5 blocks , a 8 mins easy walk to downtown Berkeley Bart station is available now for rent.
[master bedroom]: rented out to a male student from UCB
[guest bedroom]:Look for 1-2 male students to share, can live one male student, also can bring your own roommate to share guest bedroom($1000/per month per person)
Rent:$1795 per month if one person to live in the guest bedroom alone
Deposit: $1795
Available now.
Tenants are responsible for all utilities.
Rental term: One year or more.
Renter's insurance is required.
An award winning green building of 2 bedrooms/1 bath corner unit with gated courtyard Includes kitchen with new appliances, dish washer , garbage disposal, microwave, oven, gas stove, lots of closets space, and 2 bedrooms with each walk in closets.
*Very safe area (regularly patrolled), minimal noise.
*6 blocks easy walk to Cal Berkeley Campus
*4-5 blocks walk to downtown Berkeley Bart station
*3 and a half block walk to Trader Joe's.
*Secured entry into the 2nd floor
*Parking is available at additional cost
*Passive solar benefits, PG&E is much inexpensive.
*Updated kitchen (with dishwasher, granite counter-tops) garbage disposal, gas stove, lots of closets space, and island dining table.
*High ceiling/ skylight with a lot of natural light to save electrical bills.
*In unit laundry.
*Both bedrooms with each walk in closets
*Gated garden and mailbox/bike area
No pets, non smoker no drugs
Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

title: Share a great 3BR house on Great Highway with ONE roommate - Avail 7/1
description:
Hello! I am looking for a roommate to share my single family, 3BR/1BA home on the Great Highway. It is available July 1st, and there would be just two of us living here. 

The place is great - clean; nice; and charming. It's a legitimate three bedroom / one bath single family home, with nice common areas for all to enjoy including an eat-in kitchen, living room, backyard, and lots of shared garage space.

Features include:
- Living room with inviting decor
- A working, wood burning fireplace that we use occasionally.
- Kitchen with granite counters
- New dishwasher
- Hardwood floors
- Free washer/dryer
- Central heating
- Bathroom with tub and separate shower
- Nice touches all over
- Nicely landscaped backyard
- Garage with surfboard rack 
- Spare bedroom
- Plenty of space for storage, office, art studio, etc.

A bit about the location: we are on the lower Great Highway, literally across the street from the beach and the newly closed Great Highway Park. Noriega and Judah street businesses are a short walk away. Outer Sunset neighborhood haunts include various nice restaurants, coffee shops, a killer taco truck, bakeries, two excellent markets, bars, late night corner stores, and good vibes. Parking is never a problem, and the neighborhood is one of the friendliest, quietest places to live in San Francisco.

I currently share the house with one roommate, who lives is the downstairs bedroom and uses one of the upstairs bedrooms as a work from home office. Previous roommates have used the garage to set up things like an art studio, bike storage, or bench press. The vacating roommate will also be leaving a large amount of garage space unused, which you could potentially use to fulfill your wildest dreams.

A bit about me: I'm a woman in my early 40s and a server at a great Italian restaurant in the Mission, and I love living on the Great Highway. I keep it mellow at home; sometimes I will have a few friends over but mostly use the place to relax and cook meals.  I don't have any pets. 

Rent: $2100/month (this is an even split of the current rent). Move in: First month's rent + security deposit. I require a signed roommate agreement, and ask that you plan to stay for at least one year.

Please reach out if you have any questions!

title: Roommate for Secret Garden
description:
Available August 1
Large room available in 2 bedroom apartment. Furnished kitchen and living space. Extra large bedroom perfect for an artist or creative who needs extra space to create. The apartment shares a gorgeous secret garden with the upstairs neighbor. Lots of plants and plenty of outdoor furniture to enjoy the outdoors. It’s great for a gardener who is looking to expand their plant collection. 
laundry and dryer shared with upstairs renter. Gas stove, bathtub, on a quiet tree lined street. 
Located in the Golden Gate neighborhood of Emeryville. 

Rent costs 1350 which includes utilities 

First months rent + 1350 deposit to move in 

Application/background check required 

About the roommate-
K is a queer teacher in her early thirties who likes to spend her free time cooking vegetarian food, watching scary movies, crafting and hanging out with friends. Appreciates direct communication with roommates and keeping the shared space clean.

title: Room for rent in a quiet neighborhood.
description:
Room for rent (unfurnished) in Fremont available in a 4 BR/2 BA family home. The rent is $950 including utilities / $350 deposit. We’re looking for a reliable, trustworthy and respectful simple person who can clean after themselves, a roommate who has a job just like us. Lots of room to have a peace of mind to relax .

-The room can easily fit a queen size bed.
-Sunny room with large window.
-It’s located near 880, shopping Ctr, bus and train station.

- Please no smokers, no drugs, no guest, light cooking. Treat others like you want to be treated.

title: Looking for room by September.
description: Hey I’m Dele a 40 year old male looking to rent a room with private bath anywhere in the South Bay by mid September. I can afford rent up to 1,800 dollars a month. I work full time at a a clinic and when I’m not working my hobbies include working out, going to the beach, concerts, festivals, traveling, and learning about new things. I’m easy to get along with and quiet, tidy, considerate and I always pay rent on time. I’m looking for a roommate who has similar traits. I don’t discriminate and open to living with anyone.

title: FEMALE ROOMMATE FOR CONDO IN WALNUT CREEK
description:
FEMALE ROOMMATE FOR 3-BEDROOM, 2-BATH CONDO NEAR JOHN MUIR HOSPITAL

This single level condo has been updated with the following features-

New dual pane windows and sliders in 2024
Remodeled bathroom in 2020
Newer kitchen appliances (Purchased in 2020)

Newly painted bedroom (Painted in 2025)

Large capacity LG washer and dryer
Backyard patio
Center atrium
New furnace and AC unit (Installed in 2020)
Walking distance to John Muir Hospital and San Marco medical offices
Three swimming pools in complex
Two car garage with lots of available off-street parking
Close to downtown Walnut Creek

Rent is $1,100 per month with a $1,000 deposit. 
Water and garbage are paid by landlord. Shared utilities are PGE and internet service. Roommate portion of utilities is around $125 per month.
We are in our early thirties looking for a quiet, non-smoking female roommate about the same age.

Please no pets.

title: $745/4BR - Roommate Wanted for Sunny House in West Oakland <3
description:
hi lovelies! 😊 If you're seeing this post, then you're in luck because Obsidian House is looking for another queerio to come and join our lil community out in West Oakland! ❤️

To get into the deets, the room is a cozy bedroom with tile floors, high ceilings, and a tall east-facing window offering sunlight and privacy. It has a built-in closet and can comfortably fit a full/queen size bed and a desk. Additionally, there is plenty of wall space available for you if you'd like to put up shelving or other knickknacks :3 

For extra storage space, there is a small communal closet in the hallway. We also have a very large downstairs basement with our own laundry room and an excess of space for storage and artistic/studio projects (we have a sewing table and a previous roomie had a lil carpentry setup down there). 

The living room is large with 3 bay windows, a high-vaulted ceiling, pretty views, and large, comfy couch. It's a space that could comfortably host a large group of friends if you wanted. The kitchen is similarly spacious and proximal to the living room. We have a shared two-room bathroom (one room has a large bathroom vanity/jack & jill sink and the other has the toilet/shower) that is well-ventilated and decently roomy. 

We also have a pretty spacious backyard that is absolutely gorgeous during the day. The space is quite verdant and great for lil get-togethers, eating lunch, drinking tea and watching the birds, just overall a very cute space to hang out it (we also have a grill for any aspiring grill dads out there 👀) 

The house is near Filbert and 16th, is ~a 20 minute walk from the 12th and 19th St BART stations, and is in a quiet neighborhood with many small parks nearby :D Lake Merritt, DT Oakland, and Jack London are around 5-8 minutes away by car and bike respectively. The location is far enough from the highway that we don't get any noise but is quite central if you want to get into SF (I can drive to SOMA in approximately 12-20 minutes depending on traffic).

You would be living with 3 other roomies in their mid/late 20s. The vibe is warm and very chill, we enjoy regular conversation and music. Here's a lil bit about ourselves below: 

Housemates:
I (she/her): (28) Quechua trans woman with a flair for brujeria and queer art, loves dancing, writing poetry, drawing sigils, pyrography, gaming, music, and general explorative chaos. enjoys going on adventures and finding gay lil spots to haunt. autistic ambivert that enjoys hanging out in any context. Hexxus's mom 

E: (she/her): (26) mixed azn trans woman, digital artist and rave girl, into diyt, folk punk, emo, old films, fossils, sci fi, leftism, quiet night owl, out and about a lot, autistic and covid conscious

E (he/him): (24) Queer trans man with a love of cats and kitty💅. Loves walkable cities and swimming, jazz and rnb music, always down for chisme and a chat. Night owl ambivert, theatre kid, team player and receptive roomie :)

Hexxus (they/them): lil black kitty with big zoomy energy, very shy at first but quite cuddly and affectionate once they get to know you, silly tongue blep and cat loaf extraordinaire 

Everyone is conscientious about making the space a comfy, happy space to live in and we're looking for roomies that are interested in being a part of the community we share together :3 We're all quite proactive communicators, and put in effort to make house expenses and chores as equitable as possible. We share a few basic household supplies, but don't have a fully communal food/cooking system or anything, so if you're looking for a bit of co-op lite vibes, this would be perfect for you! The house is 420 and SW/sex-positive, along with being cat friendly (as long as your kitty is comfy sharing space with another cat). However, we can't accept a dog at this time due to one of the roomies being allergic :(

In terms of the application process, we are looking for someone to move in on August 1st and eventually renew on a one-year lease with the three of us starting in November. Our landlord unfortunately requires that you have decent credit standing (~670 or more) and make 3x the rent (~2235 a month).

If interested, please send over an email detailing a little bit about you, what you do for work, whether you meet the application requirements, and your hobbies/interests. Looking forward to hearing from ya! ;3

$745/month.
Location: near Filbert & 16th
Nearby transit: Nearby 12th, 19th, & West Oakland BART, quite a few bus lines around :D 
Move-in date: August 1st
Security Deposit: one month's rent
Landlord: Requires at least a ~670 credit score and that you make 3x the rent for your room
Utilities: averages around $100 a month, split between roomies
Bathrooms: one two-room bathroom with a Jack & Jill sink, shared between roomies
Laundry: Washer and dryer in-unit
Bedrooms: 4
Kitchen: Microwave, stove/oven, instantpot, stand mixer, shared cupboards and fridge  
Backyard: Lovely lil sunny backyard with lots of space for social gatherings. We also have a loquat tree that's perfect to eat fruit from during the summer ;3 
Pets: Open to cats

title: LOOKING FOR FEMALE ROOMMATE TO SHARE 2 BED/2 BATH HOME IN W. SR
description:
Available immediately!!

Liberal female looking for a like-minded female roommate to share a 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom home in 55+ mobile home community in West Santa Rosa. Must be 45+ to apply. Must be someone who values cleanliness, order, and respect for shared spaces. Non-smoker in the house, drug-free (420 friendly,) and committed to maintaining a quiet and safe home. Home is located close to Highway 12, Oliver's shopping center and Food Max.

Rent including all utilities is $1,000 per month
Room is available on a month-to-month basis (with preference for long-term)
Security deposit is $500
Room rental is for a single individual
Shared kitchen and living space; attached shed for light storage
Washer and dryer in unit
Street parking
Quiet 55+ community with access to pool, hot tub, and community center
Animals negotiable (I have a 5 year-old blind Chihuahua)
420 friendly
Room is unfurnished but can provide a queen size bed if needed
Bathroom is attached; small walk-in closet plus a linen closet in room
A love of gardening is a plus
Must clean up after yourself, be neat, and participate in regular cleaning of common spaces
Must have reliable verifiable employment, good credit

title: Seeking queer roommate for North Oakland 2-bedroom apartment
description:
Seeking queer community-oriented roommate for a 2-bedroom apartment in North Oakland (Bushrod neighborhood). 

-$1300/month for a large room, includes a cute reading nook. $1300 security deposit. 
-August 1st, year long lease, good relationship with hands-off landlord 
-Utilities about $50/month per person (for PG&E, other utilities included)
-Building has 6 units, people are quiet and we share a small backyard (fig, yuzu, and plum trees, plus raspberries and roses)
-Washer only, line dry in the backyard 
-Lots of indoor plants and opportunity to garden in the backyard.
-Bathtub if you like to soak
-Living room has central gas heating, doesn’t reach as well to the bedrooms but you could use a space heater. I use an electric blanket in the winter. 
-Dover Street park is very close, neighborhood has many families and is quiet. I really enjoy daily walks. 7 minute bike to MacArthur BART. 
-There’s a door between my room and the open room, not in use, I have a bookshelf in front but sometimes noise can travel between. 
-Apartment is on the first floor and the open room as windows that look onto the street (partially covered by big agave plants) and other windows that look onto the driveway. 
-Accessibility: a few steps up into the building
-Driveway with 4 spots we share amongst tenants. Easy to find street parking within a block or two. 
-Cat(s) potentially allowed if we check in with the landlady. 

About me: I’m Saturn (they/them), queer, 34, im a health teacher at a school in SF (I commute 4 days a week). I leave the house around 7am and come home at 4:30pm. I’m poly and sex positive so looking for a roommate that’s also sex positive. I also strive to be mindful of making noise when it’s late. I love foraging for plants, making art, doing drag, riding my bike, and cooking with people. I’m fairly social so looking for a roommate that’s okay with my having a friend or partner over. I always do my dishes, like to be tidy and put things away by the end of the day, and im also okay with a little dirt…not too fussy. I’m also responsive in to feedback on cleaning if there are areas you prefer to be spotless. Looking for someone to chat with at the end of the day and be friendly. Awesome if we end up being friends. Great if we want to share food though not required. 

Text me to schedule a time to chat on the phone!

title: Roommate Wanted - Reduced Rent in Exchange for Pet Care
description:
Seeking: A kind and empathetic woman or woman-identifying person to share my 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in Campbell. I’m offering reduced rent in exchange for pet care. Ideally, I’m looking for someone with prior experience handling dogs, especially as mine is getting older and more reactive on walks. That said - if you’re not able to offer pet care but feel like we’d be a good match, feel free to reach out anyway.

Rent: $1,180/month (includes water, trash, and sewer; total rent for the unit is approximately $2,950/month)

 Location: La Valencia Apartments, Campbell (2nd floor, short flight of stairs)
<10 min walk to Safeway and Campbell Plaza
<15 min walk to Winchester VTA Station
About the Space:
Your Room: Spacious and full of natural light (not the master).

Bathroom: Private and roomy - your own.

Common Areas: Fully furnished, including the kitchen.
Please note: I don’t have a lot of room for additional furniture in the common areas. This setup is best for someone who’s comfortable keeping most of their things in their own bedroom. You’ll have access to kitchen cabinets and a shared fridge space, but storage is limited outside the room.

About Me:
I’m a 36-year-old tech professional who values kindness, empathy, and community. I work a hybrid schedule—some days from home, some at the office. I love dancing (I take classes in the South Bay), watching TV, reading, and spending time with good people. 
I occasionally eat meat, so this isn’t a vegetarian household. Because of a chronic illness, I’m home a lot and tend to create a cozy, guest-friendly environment. I’m queer-friendly and would love to live with someone who shares similar values. I care deeply about community and social justice, and I value thoughtful, inclusive conversations at home. If you’re someone who also thinks about the world beyond these walls, we’ll probably get along great.

About You:
I’d love to share my home with someone who is:
Kind, helpful, and considerate
Ideally experienced with dog care (walking, feeding, play, and occasional pet sitting)
Comfortable around one dog (no other pets, please - mine is reactive to animals)
If this sounds like a fit, I’d love to hear from you. I’m a bit slow to respond sometimes due to work and health, but I’ll get back to you as soon as I can.

title: Looking for roomate for 2 person house
description:
Hi there, my roomate is moving to the East coast so I am looking for a new roommate in a 3br/2.5 bath house, and you and I will be the only tenants.

This is for the master bedroom of a house in a pretty quiet family neighborhood. Basically it will be me + you sharing a full sized house and we each have a different bedroom and share the rest of the house.


Move in date: Aug 1 2025 (but my roomate will be out around mid July so early move in is possible), lease is yearly

I don't have any annoying "rules” and anyone can gladly be my roommate if you are nice and respectful, and I am the same! We will both live there and it will be our home, so I hope both of us can be ourselves and be comfortable and happy!


I don't own the house, I am also just renting the other room, so the rules are just whatever is on the lease (typical stuff like no pets and no smoking) but the landlord is very chill though and you’ll probably never see him


There are 3 bedrooms:
a- $1450 - this is the available room, it is the master bedroom which is the biggest room and also has the private bathroom in the room
b- $1250 - this is my room, its a medium size and the bathroom is in the hall next to it
c- Not for rent - this is the smallest room and we basically just use it as a closet/guest room and it even has a bed if you have friends visiting.


About me:
I am a 31 year old software engineer male
I get along with everyone
When I am at home you will usually see me in my room on the internet or watching some show.
On the weekends I will either hang out with my girlfriend/friends, eat out at some nice restaurants, or just relax at home


About the house:
-It is a full normal sized 2-story house, 3br/2.5 bath, and there are no other tenants besides me+you
-2 car garage attached to house that will fit most cars (but a bit low if you have a super tall opening trunk) and also street parking if you prefer
-Washer/drier in the garage
-Full kitchen with stove/oven, microwave , etc, and getting a brand new fridge in a few days
-1 mile from several different plazas with many restaurants, boba tea places, etc
-Backyard area, not huge but big enough to hang out and have a BBQ or something


Note that the price doesn't include utilities, which we will split 50/50. Water bill is usually maybe $200 every 2 months, xfinity(tv/internet) depends on whichever plan we choose. PG&E is the expensive one and is usually in the 300s with a few lower months and higher in the coldest/hottest months, but for me its important to stay comfortable in our own home so if its cold I will still turn on the heat (instead of saving money if thats your concern)
a

Let me know if you are interested or have any questions, ***and please write a little about yourself so I get to know you too***

2BR / 2Ba available NOW


dogs are OK - wooof 
apartment 
laundry on site 
no smoking 
street/on site parking 
private bath 
private room 
rent period: monthly 

Private bedroom and bathroom for rent in spacious 2 bed 2 bath apartment 2 minute walk from downtown Fairfax. Shared kitchen and living room with one housemate. Large balcony looking out over greenery. Shared swimming pool with complex. Non smoking property. Available July 1.

I am a 30 year old woman looking for a roommate for my apartment. I have a job and work at least 5 days a week, so I’m gone during the days and typically home from 7 onwards. Looking for quiet, respectful, friendly, clean roommate, friends or partners welcome but no parties. The apartment complex is quiet after 10 pm. Inquire about pets if interested. title: Single mom looking for professional roommates
description: Hi there I am a 41 year old single mom to a 12 year old looking for a female only business professional or student with earned income to rent the extra room in my townhome which I rent from the owner. Must pass background check and deposit etc. Small room with back door entrance. I have been living in my current home for 9 years and have had good experiences with previous roommates. Details to those interested. Rent is $1,000 plus pg and e which is usually $100.00 - $150 in winter months. No pets no couples. Message me for details. Month to month and new lease required upon approval by landlord. JR College area very desirable . Downstairs bathroom has sink and toilet for semi private use. Upstairs bathroom is shared by my daughter and I and roommate for showering.

title: looking for two house mates to fill two rooms
description:
FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE IN: 3BR/2BA home with two immediately available, private rooms.

Looking to fill the two separate vacant, private rooms IMMEDIATELY. Would prefer female roommates but am open to other options.

contact me at: (9160) 601-5083
ROOMS:
-Move in date is ASAP.
-1 year lease; deposit is one month's rent, $1200.
-Each room are individual private rooms -Bills: Rent, currently $1,200 each room; Utilities ranging around $85-100 each housemate (water and trash included)
-Ethernet
-Rooms approximately 12x12
-Windows that bring in a lot of natural sunlight
-Shared bathroom just outside your room.
-Both have big closets

SHARED HOUSE BENEFITS:
-Living room: Fully furnished with a very comfortable L-shaped couch and a cute coffee table.
-Dining room: Fully furnished with a dining table that can fit multiple people for any friends or family that come hangout. There is even a fun Tiki Bar for those great celebratory moments.
-The shared full kitchen has all the amenities to cook those amazing meals.
-In unit washer and dryer
-Shared parking spot right out front
-To top it all off, the huge balcony is a great place to sit and relax while watching the beautiful sunrise and sunsets.

Hello! I am a female in my early 20s just graduated college. I love video games, film, anime, traveling, and going to concerts. When I’m not working I’m either out with friends or hanging out in my room so sometimes it may seem like I’m not even there. I love to make new friends and would love to hangout with whoever moves in! I am incredibly easy going and don’t have a problem with a lot of things as long as you’re helping keep the place nice and clean. Feel free to decorate how you want and make this place feel like home to you. The other two roommates moved out recently. I’m in the process of finding their replacements so as of right now it’s just me. I would prefer female roommates but i am open to other options. Move in date is ASAP. Unfortunately the property manager won’t allow pets and no couples.

Excellent location in South SF. A quick two minute drive to the freeway: Be in SF or San Mateo within 15 minutes! You are also a 10 minute drive from SFO. Located right across the street is Philz, Paris Baguette, Quickly, Walgreens, Pho Saigon, and various other grocery stores and restaurants. Sellick Park just next door for those great workouts or picnics.

title: Looking for a roommate for a beautiful 2bed-2bath in Hayes Valley
description:
Hi all - I'm looking for a roommate for a beautiful 2 bed, 2 bath in Hayes Valley. I love the apartment but my current roommate is moving out to live with her boyfriend. This would be a lease renewal for 1-yr, starting in July. 

The building is managed, with a doorman from 8am-8pm, gym, roof with grill, and a parking garage. The apartment itself is spacious, gets a lot of sunlight, has in-unit washer and dryer, and has a balcony. The apartment is mostly furnished, but that can be discussed. Roommate's portion of rent would be $2325 excluding utilities. 

I'm an early thirties female who recently moved to the city for a new job after completing my MBA. I'm quiet and tidy. Preference for a female roommate with similar quiet and tidy habits. If you've made it this far, please comment your favorite fruit when you reply.

title: For September move in (had to make a new acct)
description:
Looking for a roomate(s) to rent our master bedroom in September. Potrero Hill, San Francisco, more pictures coming
It has its en suite bathroom and a walk in closet, plus lots of windows for natural light.
The floor is carpet in the bedrooms. The rest of the house is wood.
The house is 3 bedrooms, up one decent size flight of stairs. The front door has a gate door on the outside of it. 
Room is on the top floor, laundry is on the bottom floor. 
The house is a townhome so we share space with upstairs neighbors. We have one spot in our garage and use of the driveway.
In the back we have a garden/small yard space and storage space underneath the house.
There is a medium-large kitchen with a 5 burner stove, 2 sinks, dishwasher, and island space with chairs.
Dining area has a large table with chairs.
Living space is open plan, sectional couch, coffee table, 32" TV and just about every streaming service. Plus many games.
Various decor on the walls/around the house.

There will be 2 female roommates (a friend might be livng downstairs with me for a little bit, but undetermined) I also have a dog, very friendly, sometimes a little too friendly lol. She does not bark under most circumstances, she has a kennel in the living space for when she is alone.
Unfortunately we can't have any other dogs or cats.

Rent is $2,035 slightly negotiable 
Utilities vary depending on the amount of people, I would say they aren't too bad.
We also have a cool landlord.

title: Looking for 2 Female Roommates (small dog considered)
description:
I have one furnished bedroom and 1 unfurnished bedroom available in my ground floor 3 bedroom apartment available August 2

The complex looks like a resort:  (pool and fitness room right outside my apartment):  Fitness room with 3 treadmills, 2 elliptical machines, weight machines, spin bikes, weights, dry sauna, pool, hot tub, BBQ areas, dog park. 2 miles from Dublin BART station, 580/680 highways, close to Stoneridge Mall and many churches.

SINGLE FEMALE OCCUPANT ONLY

$1,200 per  month
$300 deposit
$30 per month for housekeeper
(Extra $60/mo. if you have a dog - apartment complex policies)

MUST HAVE GOOD CREDIT as you will have to qualify for the lease (however I am willing to do a roommate release if unable to stay the duration of the lease)

A little about me:  I'm a middle-aged Italian, outgoing Italian female.  I'm congenial, fun-loving, and very young at heart. I listen to K-LOVE radio. 

Full kitchen privileges.  Washer and dryer in unit.  Shared bathroom.

WIFI is included, split some utilities.

My housekeeper does all the deep cleaning, so we just keep the living areas and bathroom tidy.   

No drugs, smoking, or overnight male guests.

Feel free to text or call me at  show contact info
.

title: Room for rent in a beautiful house!
description:
Hello community seekers! My name is Honey! I am one of three unicorns looking to find our fourth and fifth Roommates! We live in a house called the Unicorn Ring.

The Unicorn Ring is a spacious Victorian style home with vaulted ceilings in a glorious location! We are located off of Market and San Pablo, right in the middle of downtown, Emeryville, Temescal, Lake, Merritt, Berkeley and West Oakland. 4 blocks away from the freeway and 3 min drive or 20 min walk to MacArthur BART station or 19th st. The 72 BUS is right by our house and runs every 5 min. Besides having a great location, our house has a magical energy that can be felt by anyone who enters! We are welcoming all bad ass, compassionate, silly, good smelling humans who like to bathe regularly to join out family! Are you the one?🤪 

All of us are artists who wish to better ourselves and the world around us. We believe that building a strong, tight community is the first step to find happiness!

(Please note that we cannot have cats here due to allergies…sorry cat lovers!)

The downstairs room is a 11’x10’ space. The downstairs two rooms have a shared bathroom and there is also a bathroom upstairs. The downstairs bathroom has a shower and the upstairs has a bath and shower and is shared by everyone. There is a washer and dryer in the unit. Huge kitchen, plenty of storage space and a huge driveway. The property has four units on it. One is the bottom floor of this three-story house and there are two other units behind the house. The property is protected by a 6 foot gate. There isn’t too much room to garden, but you are welcome to join me! Check out the pictures and see how you like the space.

Rent and deposit each $900. 
W/S/G included in rent
PG&E runs between $300-$500 depending on the time of year.
Internet Sonic $83
All utilities are split 5 ways (so you would be paying $16 for Internet and, at most, $100 for PG&E)
We use Splitwise for the shared bills and tp. 


We are all busy responsible adults that spend a lot of time focused on ourselves, but we love to spend time with each other when we come together naturally. We keep a clean space, but we are also not tight asses. None of us drink much. No pets currently. 


A little bit about us:

I, Honey, am 35, ENFJ, Libra, double psych and music major at Cal State East Bay, Nanny, vocalist, event hostess, cook and clown. I really love people! I threw a monthly jam here at the house. Hope you like live funk music!

John, 45, Dr. of Music composition with a masters in experimental psychology. Pianist, middle school teacher, a complete anomaly of a human being! You’ve never met anyone like him!

Jasmyne, 36, gorgeous bartender/waitress, has a beautiful dog named Maze. Maze is PERFECT..OMG, talk about a good dog! Jasmyne is often out of the house but dumb fun to be around when she’s home!

All except myself are out of the house most of the time.

We are hoping to fill them by the 9th. Background check required at the expense of the applicant.

It has been a long journey for everyone to find the right space to call home! We are very open minded and accepting of all humans but also very protective of our space. The expectations we have of our new roommate, besides the obvious, paying rent on time and keeping the space reasonably clean, is; clear, communication, and a mature, self aware attitude. All four of us are very direct, assertive and humorous. Hakuna Matata, as long as we are all sharing mutual respect for one another. Looking forward to meeting you!

Please feel free to message me if you prefer that over email.

Thank you and happy hunting!

title: Roommate wanted for 168 Bluxome St
description:
A friend and I are looking for a roommate to fill a 3rd room at 168 Bluxome St, which is a 3 bedroom loft. Rent is $1300 per person per month with utilities (including internet) coming up to around $60 per month per person, and there is a parking garage available as well. The loft is right next to the San Francisco Caltrain Station, with a Safeway and Walgreens 2 blocks away.

My current roommate and I are both musicians, I've just graduated from the San Francisco Conservatory of Music and my roommate will be a student there.

title: Presidio 3/1.5 share
description:
Welcome to the Presidio and enjoy our Big BR with oversized closet. We hope to have 1 more person share the 3BR2BA townhome on a 3 month Presidio lease (w auto-renew opp, of course.) 2 females myself and an employed Berkley grad will be on the lease with you, each w a private room. We will only be here a few days a week. You will be taking the place of our roommate who is leaving around  July 15. 

Enjoy a remodeled big kitchen,  laundry room with full-sized washer/dryer, tidy furnishings and brand-new carpet!

No need for a vehicle, although parking is available. We are connected to bus line and 1/2 block from a frequent stop. Walk to Marshall or Baker beach in 20 min or less, Golden Gate Bridge, cafes, restaurants, museums. This beautiful clean home is conveniently located in SF with plenty of parking with park pass. 

Available July 15 w/ lease to renew Aug 31, if desired. 

This is a Gorgeous 3/2 townhome by Inner Richmond. Great parking on our street and 1 park pass is  available. We are 1 male, living here only part-time and 1 female, also  living here part-time. There’s nothing better than this convenient park Presidio lifestyle. Presidio townhome is safe and central. There’s a furnished kitchen, dining and living room and sunny private back patio facing the beach and sunset. 

With the lease Presidio residents have a background check required to provide another layer of safety. Leave your packages on the porch. With parking pass, park right in front or in designated spot. No need even for a vehicle. We are connected to MUNI and have a stop in back of home for express shuttle (free to residents) to downtown in 30 minutes!

There is extra deposit and charge for dogs with the leasing office and responsibility to keep tidy. Home is clean and considerate.

Looking forward to your reply! Thanks!

title: Loft for rent in pleasant hill NEAR REFINERIES AND DVC Fully furnished
description:
Looking for a roommate to rent this cute loft in my townhome It has everything to make you feel comfortable. Shared bathroom and shower downstairs. Feel free to text or call with any question anytime 24 by 7. 

Six month lease. Move-in fees: First month rent plus refundable deposit (equal to 1.5 times monthly rent). No pets, no smoking. 

The room is available now. Must work or study or have verifiable income. This loft is not suitable for working from home.

Safe and quiet place to sleep in a well-established neighborhood mostly owner occupied. 

Here is the number again.
41five-32six-449seven

As you see there is fridge micro tea kettle and coffee machine. 

Near (1/2 mile walking)  to DVC and hospitals and refineries. Close to interstate 80. if you are looking for a place to crash at night this is an affordable option. Minimum six month lease. Maximum one year lease. A discount given for an entire year lease.  1/2 off first month. 


Thanks

title: Conscious Community Home with the best view ever, plus a hot tub
description:
-Room is available August 1. Month to month. 

Come join our Oakland Community home. Our house is full of Burners; positive, educated, loving people, dancers, yogis, musicians, world travelers, intellectually deep humans, and entrepreneurs, who love to grow, support each other, share ideas, and share deep connections.

NOTE: This ad for a 2020 Geo Pro 20ft trailer we're renting out as a space, with electrical, heating, ac, your own fridge, high speed wifi and a queen bed in our beautiful back yard with a hot tub overlooking the bay. You'd have access to all the things in the house and be part of the community. The Trailer bathroom is converted in to a closet, and you will use the shared bathrooms inside. Plus having a separate space from the house means there's less noise and you can be louder as well. Also, we just moved it a bit so the wall with the couch fully expands now (need to take a new picture as there is more room inside than the pictures show)

Why our place is GREAT:
- Live with smart, educated self-aware roommates that are excited about their lives, and want to deeply connect, support each other, adventure and explore.
- Surround yourself with friends actively seeking to grow through conscious activities and community.
- Be part of a growing network of community homes, interconnected throughout the Bay Area.
- Co-create your shared home rather than just staying in someone else's house.
- Full use of everything, have guests over, play music, hang out with us
- Attic guest bedroom/cuddle space, so you're welcome to have friends spend the night occasionally
- Hot tub, projector, tree platform, space to garden, outside gym / workout space, adjustable free weights, squat rack, yoga mats, etc
-Suspension points in the living room vaulted ceiling for Shabari, silks, etc
- Amazing View, rolling hills, SF and Oakland skylines.
-We throw events occasionally which brings the community together

Details about this House:
6-bedroom, 3 bathrooms, 2500 sq foot, large 2 story house in a residential area.
Kitchen, 4 refrigerators, gas stove, garbage disposal, dishwasher, fully stocked kitchen and common space, garden, hot tub, 1080p projector, basement storage, in-unit washer-dryer.

Room Details:
- utilities are ($120) flat rated: includes Pge, water, garbage, high-speed net, and shared expenses.
- street parking
- Month to month (must give 30-day notice ending on the end of a month)
- Last Month's Rent, Security deposit ($400)

About Us:
Jill - Program Coordinator at the California Institute of Integral Studies
Authentic, emotionally aware, ambivert, expert communicator, runs harm reduction and peer support spaces at festivals, Dancer, flow artist, yogi, world travler, with an adorable well-taken care of bunny named Trousers

Genevive - Model and Crypto Enthusiast
Enjoys mastering her interests, focused, determined, passionate about her dreams, loves traveling and being strange in very funny ways, like wearing crazy costumes, and making everyone smile.

Niane - Massage Theripist
Brazilian world traveler with positive and relaxing energy. Wise, caring, loving, great at being present and helping us all let go of the little things, and has a way of enjoying life no matter what it throws at you.

Blake - Habitat restoration manager and Sf cycling guide
poet/musician/performance artist, adventurous, theater lover, gardener, kills it on the harmonica, just moved from Brooklyn and excited to explore the bay.

Jake – Open-hearted therapist, project manager.
Spends his free time getting lost in deserts or mountains. Can be found swinging high on rocks or trees. Perpetual smiler. Lover of humans and a good sunset.

Sierra - Acupuncturist, Painter, Professional dancer
Emotionally self-aware human who feels into a space and enjoys connection. Loves art from sketching in a notebook to painting giant murals, Trained as a belly dancer, coming from the Santa Cruz community, and excited to explore the bay

Roommate we're looking for:
Great communicator, playful, clean, creative, loving, self-aware, intellectually deep, trustworthy, and who will treat the house with respect. If you're looking for a community and great people to live with, then you should definitely connect with us.

Questions for you:
- What are you passionate about? what excites you? what drives you?
- What you do for fun, your welcome to include pictures
- Why do you want to live with us, in community? What are you looking for? How will you contribute?
- Your are you working on these days? any Pets?

- Interested? Send an e-mail telling us about yourself (the more the better), include your social media or a few pictures of you being you, and leave a phone number. Thank you!

title: Private Room and Bathroom in Luxury Home - Los Gatos
description:
Views, Privacy in this relaxing in this spa-like experience for a sophisticated roommate. Amazing Kitchen w/top of the line appliances, dining & Living Room both access to a relaxing outdoor entertaining area/Jacuzzi and amazing views. Home has been completed remolded.

Private Room and Bathroom.  Looking for a mature, neat, clean, responsible person to share entire home. Perfect for a Professional, Student or traveling Nurse. This is not a party house. Inside Laundry Room and Beautiful Quiet Backyard. Maid Service is included.
No pets/couples/drugs/alcoholics/smoking.

Amazing Location that is Close to downtown Los Gatos/Campbell 17 & 85 One of the most desirable Neighborhoods in Silicon Valley. Close to Saratoga, Cupertino, Sunnyvale Mountain View, and San Jose.  

Please reply via e-mail with a description of who you are and what you are looking for.  If the ad is posted, it is available.   Please include  Links to Facebook and or LinkedIn.  If this ad is listed it is available.

THIS IS A MUST SEE PLACE AND LOCATION!!!

title: Great Value & Great Location
description:
One bedroom with its own bathroom is available now. The location of this property is 15-minute driving to downtown San Francisco, 10-minute to Bay Street of Emeryville where all the shops, restaurants and Movie Theater are and 15-minute to downtown Berkeley.

--- It's within walking distance to Berkeley Bowl Market (The Best Whole Food Market in the Bay Area), San Francisco Bay Trail, Berkeley Ironworks and the City Sports Club. 
--- There are a free bus shuttle service (Emery-Go-Round) 3 blocks away from the house to MacArthur BART daily. 

We are looking for a clean and responsible roommate, no smoking or pets. The unit has a cleaning service once a month. The current 3 working roommates are respectful and easy going. The lease is minimum 6 months. The utilities are not included in the rent. If you are interested in the room, please email us a bit about yourself. For more information or viewing the room, please provide us your cell phone number in your email. We will contact you as soon as we get your information.

title: Two Unfurnished Rooms and Private Bath
description:
Two Rooms and Private Bath for $1375 - Use one as your bedroom, one as your study/sitting room. Includes: private bath, linen closet, separate pantry shelving and private new refrigerator, safe off-street parking, use of washer/dryer, fully equipped kitchen, back deck and BBQ, small veggie garden area. Space for your bike or kayak in garage.  Both rooms have insulated / room-darkening curtains and new screens, newer carpet and paint.  Rooms, bath and linen closet are all side-by-side upstairs. Includes Sonic WiFi and Recology; but shared PGE and Water/Sewer. 

I'm an active older female, healthy and in good shape, please be the same.  My 4 bd/3 bath home is drama-free, quiet, clean, well-kept and located down a private off-street driveway, in a safe Santa Rosa family-friendly neighborhood. Looking for one mature, low-key older roommate, who is also easy-going, drama-free, conscientious of water and PGE use and recycling. Keeping a clean home and pro-active communication are priorities and a must for you as well. Hoping to find one, long-term roommate with a good sense of humor to share my home with.

I live with my sweet, friendly Shiba Inu. Your one, small (25-lb), well-behaved, healthy, neutered/spayed dog is welcome here - after the dogs meet and "The Shiba Paw of Approval".  Let's trade occasional dog care. Then once the dogs settle in together, we each can then take an occasional short trip, knowing our pups are safe with "friends" at home.  If you don't have a dog but love their energy and having one in your life, I'm open to discussing rent reduction in exchange for dog care while I'm on an occasional trip.

$1375 Security Deposit. Initial 6-month Rental Agreement, then month-to-month.  Move-in date can be flexible; let's talk.

No Home Businesses, Heavy Gamers, nor E-Traders.

title: Cute Mission sublet with yard/garden 🌺🌸
description: Summer/ fall sublet . It’s an awesome place with a backyard/garden. It has a fire pit and pizza oven . I’m working outside of the USA and looking for someone cool to sublet. I have a roommate and her cat is also really cool. Place is clean and the neighborhood is my favorite. 1,200 a month let me know if you would like to see it or we can have a call or FaceTime . Cool peeps only !

title: Room in Central San Jose
description:
Hi,
I'm looking for a roommate. The room is $1,100 and the utilities are split between the 3 of us which includes PG&E, water, garbage, internet, and once a month cleaning service. Deposit is $1,100. The lease term is 6 months and month-to-month thereafter. The room is available now. 

Location:
The house is located next to San Jose City College (walking distance) and less than a minute to I-280, I-880, 87 and 17 (all major freeways). Probably the best commuter location in San Jose. The house is less than 2 miles away from Santana Row and Valley Fair mall and is close to downtown San Jose, and downtown Campbell. 

Room/House:
The house is approximately 2,000 square feet and shared with 3 people including me. The room is approximately 14 x 10 feet with vaulted ceilings. Bathroom will be shared with only one other person. Street parking only. 

About me:
I'm a 40 year old business professional male who is super clean, likes sports, outdoors, traveling, gym, and hanging out with friends.

Looking For:
Male/Female student or a working professional who is extremely clean. This is not a party house but a quiet place to come home to. No drugs/smoking in the house and no pets. Single occupancy. 

Important: If interested, please send me a description of yourself, your job, and a LinkedIn profile. I use LinkedIn or social media to verify you are a real person and not a bot.

Thank you for your interest and please let me know if you have any questions.
Alex

title: Room in LARGE, Sunny 2BR Flat in the Mission
description:
Hello.

If your heart is in Berkeley but you live in San Francisco, let's talk. I have a spacious, sunny apartment in the Mission. The place is fully furnished, except for the bedroom (which is approximately 12’ x 12’; with 4.5’ x 2.5’ closet). The last roommate/former occupant took off for grad school.

ABOUT THE PLACE:
Large Living Room w/working fireplace
Formal Dining Room
Kitchen w/Pantry
Sun-Deck
Small Inner Patio
Split Bath
Washer/Dryer, Dishwasher
Limited storage space
Street parking, but VERY close to MUNI/BART (1 block)

ABOUT ME:
I'm male, and work in education. I work from 8 - 6 or longer and when I’m done I like to enjoy laid-back, quiet, lazy evenings at home. Home is sanctuary, and I'm not the sort who always has to be constantly on-the-go. I like to enjoy a nice meal, have some wine, watch TV, talk, laugh, and unwind. I watch a lot of sports (mostly tennis, but also track & field, football, etc.) and regular programs (Supernatural, Family Guy, SNL, and 60 Minutes to name a few). I also like to channel surf (ESPN/2, Discovery, BBC, History, TV Land). Or, I’m cool just having a lazy day to meditate, read, or sit and do nothing. I also like to go to movies, the symphony, comedy shows, a good sports bar or a bad dive bar. On the weekends, I like to sleep-in late. I'm mostly reserved, but I can be loud once I warm up and I have a good sense of humor—sometimes dark, sometimes dry. I'm not a neat-freak but cleanliness is a must: messy is one thing; dirty is something else entirely.

ABOUT YOU:
I'm looking for someone who is laid-back, and who is gainfully employed or otherwise able to pay rent/utilities on time; someone who takes care of things and is responsible, and who communicates well. I am looking for a roommate who wants a home (even if temporary) and not just a place to stay—not necessarily a best friend or partner-in-crime, but also not looking to live like two strangers. I definitely want a roomie who wants to have a pretty casual living environment, to hang out and talk, laugh, watch some tv, and have a meal or two together. Since there’s a shared bathroom, ideally am looking to live with another guy. (In a shared space there can be various states of undress: partial nudity or just nude. I am NOT nudist, but naked happens.) If you play cards and board games, you rock! If you're not a snob or a bigot, that's best. If you're into get-togethers with lots of good food, drinking some, and laughing A LOT, that's awesome. But my party days are over so no late, loud nights. Open communication and mutual respect are ESSENTIAL.

ABOUT THE NOPE
No pets (due to allergies)
No smoking
No drugs
No couples or frequent overnight guests
Thank you in advance.

ABOUT THE DETAILS:
Costs (approximate and negotiable): First Month's Rent $1,200 + Move-in Deposit $1,200 = $2,400; Utilities (PG&E, Cable) average ~ $100/month. Availability (negotiable): August 1 or Sept 1.

So, if you’re interested in a quality living environment, drop me a note and let me know a little about yourself and what you’re seeking.

Thanks.
